definition: ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat

sentences.english: Whatever you eat, leave space for ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 无论你吃什么，留点胃给冰激凌。

sentences.english: Whoever figured out that a scoop of ice cream was meant to float in a glass of fizzy soda did his fellow man a good turn.
sentences.chinese: 是谁发现了冰激凌可浮于汽水上的事实？

sentences.english: You have your choice of three flavors of ice cream.
I would eat more ice cream and less bran.
sentences.chinese: 我会多吃一些冰激凌，少吃一些米。

sentences.english: I like ice cream and cookies as much as the next guy.
sentences.chinese: 和其他人一样我也酷爱冰激凌和小点心。

sentences.english: Maston had his class build ice-cream-stick mockups of products no one would buy.
sentences.chinese: M让他班里的学生制造没人会买的冰激凌棒模型。

sentences.english: Even banana cream pie gets tiresome if you have to eat it three times a day.
sentences.chinese: 就是香蕉冰激凌派，一天吃三次也会吃腻的。

sentences.english: Here's your chocolate ice cream, Pat.
sentences.chinese: 这是你的巧克力奶油冰激凌，派特。

sentences.english: Today, my daughter asked for a dollar to buy ice cream from the ice cream truck while I was on my computer working.
sentences.chinese: 今天我女儿跟我要一个刀去冰激凌车上买冰激凌。

sentences.english: Today, my daughter asked for a dollar to buy ice cream from the ice cream truck while I was on my computer working.
sentences.chinese: 今天我女儿跟我要一个刀去冰激凌车上买冰激凌。

sentences.english: Not to loiter downtown in ice cream stores.
sentences.chinese: 不准在闹市区的冰激凌店闲逛。

sentences.english: However pizzas and ice-cream can not become our regular foods because of the rich heat and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 但匹萨饼和冰激凌不能吃太多哦，因为热量高糖分多。

sentences.english: I give one yuan for ice cream.
Hot ice cream. Solid soup. Glow-in-the-dark gummy bears.
sentences.chinese: 热冰激凌，固体汤，在黑暗中会发光的橡胶熊。

sentences.english: Put the bananas and ice cream in the blender.
sentences.chinese: 把香蕉和冰激凌放进果汁机。

definition: shaved or crushed ice dessert or beverage
